cn.inbot.navigationlib

类 PadBotNavigationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.inbot.navigationlib.PadBotNavigationClient

  • public class PadBotNavigationClient
extends java.lang.Object

    Navigation binder Management Class

    导航绑定管理类

    This class is a singleton mode class. Use getInstance() method to get the instance. The instance provide the operations about the remote navigation client. Firstly, you should use the connect(Context) method to connect to the navigation, when you receive the OnNavigationClientConnectedEvent,it means you have connected to the remote navigation. Secondly, you can use the initNavigation() method to init the navigation, when you receive the OnNavigationInitedEvent, it means the remote navigation has been inited. Finally, you can use the other method to do something.

    这个类是单例模式，通过getInstance()方法获取单例对象。实例对象提供导航相关的操作，首先需要通过connect(Context)方法连接到导航， 当接收到OnNavigationClientConnectedEvent事件时表示连接成功，然后调用initNavigation()方法来初始化导航。当接收到OnNavigationInitedEvent事件时， 表示导航初始化完成，就可以调用实例提供的导航相关方法来实现导航功能了。

    Author : Inbot
    Create Date : 2020/02/11
    JDK version used : JDK1.8
    Version : V1.0.0
    Copyright ©2020 Inbot Technology Ltd. All rights reserved.

      • startNavigate

        public cn.inbot.componentnavigation.domain.ActionReturn startNavigate(int xGrid,
                                                                      int yGrid,
                                                                      int angle)
                                                               throws RemoteException
        Start navigate to somewhere by appointing the coordinates and angle.
        开始导航前往指定的坐标位置
        参数:
        xGrid - The x-axis coordinate of the target location on the map
        目标位置在地图上的x轴坐标
        yGrid - The y-axis coordinate of the target location on the map
        目标位置在地图上的y轴坐标
        angle - The angle the robot faces when it reaches the target position
        机器人到达目标位置后面向的角度
        返回:
        The information of the execution result
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • autoRelocateFixed

        public cn.inbot.componentnavigation.domain.ActionReturn autoRelocateFixed(int gridX,
                                                                          int gridY,
                                                                          int gridAngle)
                                                                   throws RemoteException
        Relocate automaticly by appointing the coordinate and angle.
        通过指定机器人的坐标和角度来定位
        参数:
        gridX - The x-axis coordinates of the robot on the map
        机器人在地图上的x轴坐标
        gridY - The y-axis coordinates of the robot on the map
        机器人在地图上的y轴坐标
        gridAngle - The angle the robot is currently facing
        机器人当前面向的角度
        返回:
        The information of the execution result
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • startCruise

        public cn.inbot.componentnavigation.domain.ActionReturn startCruise(int count)
                                                             throws RemoteException
        Start cruising with the current used map's default cruise path.
        开始巡航，执行巡航的路径为默认路径
        参数:
        count - The number of cruise executions. When it is -1, the robot will perform a circular cruise.
        巡航执行的次数，当为-1时，机器人将会进行循环巡航
        返回:
        The information of the execution result
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • startCruise

        public cn.inbot.componentnavigation.domain.ActionReturn startCruise(java.lang.String pathId,
                                                                    int count)
                                                             throws RemoteException

        按照指定的路径执行巡航
        参数:
        pathId - The id of path
        路径的id
        count - The number of cruise executions. When it is -1, the robot will perform a circular cruise.
        巡航执行的次数，当为-1时，机器人将会进行循环巡航
        返回:
        The information of the execution result
        抛出:
        RemoteException
